title: Concept: Race Conditions & Locks
content:
A Race Condition happens when two threads try to modify the same variable at the same time, leading to corrupted data.

Solution: You must use a Lock (Mutex) or synchronized block around the critical section.

Pattern:
lock.acquire()
try:
  shared_resource += 1
finally:
  lock.release()

title: Concept: Thread Pools (ExecutorService)
content:
Creating a new thread for every task is expensive and crashes the OS. 

Solution: Use a Thread Pool (Worker Pool) to reuse a fixed number of threads (e.g., 10 threads processing 1000 tasks).
